content.html: Also Silicon Valley: “the future is going to built on distributed databases of jpeg receipts. It requires more computational power than several nation states. After we make a trillion dollars from this idea, we’ll fund some carbon offsets or something.”
content.value:
Also Silicon Valley: “the future is going to built on distributed databases of jpeg receipts. It requires more computational power than several nation states.

After we make a trillion dollars from this idea, we’ll fund some carbon offsets or something.”
